name: MIS Social Care Alert Report
description:
Returns a list of Prisoners with a Social Care Alert along with their Cell Location, Age and Comment Text
PDD0056 v00.00.01 Last Modified 20/11/2015

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12) AS OFFENDER_AGE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.COMMENT_TEXT FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK || ' ' || AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION) END = 'AS Social Care' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END IS NULL OR CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12) AS OFFENDER_AGE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, '-', AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.COMMENT_TEXT FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK || ' ' || AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION) END = 'AS Social Care' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END IS NULL OR CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, OFFENDER_AGE, FIRST_NAME, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COMMENT_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)
